message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $100 to you, and we're confident it will meet your needs. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $95. We believe this offers a fair deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to counter with a price of $85. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After considering your proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $90 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $87. This price aligns closely with my budget while still recognizing the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with a price of $89 for the product. I believe this offer is fair and maintains a good balance for both of us.
